original_text: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord God.
korean_text: 네 화려함으로 말미암아 네 명성이 이방인 중에 퍼졌음은 내가 네게 입힌 영화로 네 화려함이 온전함이라 나 주 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: And thy renown went forth among the heathen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 명성이 이방인들 사이에 퍼졌으니

sentences.original_text: for it was perfect through my comeliness
which I had put upon thee
